name: Wavy Shampoo & Mask Value Set with Anti Frizz and Shine Boosters
about: What it is: A customizable repair haircare set consisting of a shampoo, conditioner mask, and two Hair Goal Concentrates (frizz taming and shine enhancing) specifically selected to enhance the results for damaged, wavy hair. This set repairs all signs of damage while taming frizz, boosting shine and fostering stronger, more resilient hair with each use...Hair Texture: Wavy..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Color Safe.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Frizz..Key Benefits:.- Targets all signs of damage.- Decrease frizz, increases shine.- Weightless hydration for softness, manageability..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex (TM/MC): Targets signs of hair damage, reduces breakage..- Lysine from Rice Amino Acids and Manketti Seed Oil: Adds body, flexibility, and shine...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know: This exclusive reparative set includes products infused with fortifying lysine and nourishing manketti seed oil. These products will give your waves body, flexibility, and radiant shine for clinically backed results youu2019ll adore...Fragrance Description: A bouquet of fresh spring flowers, with notes of pink peony, wild freesia, and creamy sandalwood...This Set Contains:.- 11 oz/ 325 mL Bond Repair Custom Shampoo for Straight, Damaged Hair.- 7 oz/ 207 mL Bond Repair Custom Conditioner Mask for Straight, Damaged Hair.- 0.13 oz/ 4 mL The Frizz Genius Anti Frizz Hair Goal Concentrate.- 0.13 oz/ 4 mL The Shine Queen Hair Gloss Goal Concentrate Mix-In
ingredients: -Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex (TM/MC): Targets signs of hair damage, reduces breakage..-Lysine from Rice Amino Acids and Manketti Seed Oil: Adds body, flexibility, and shine...Function of how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Add one Hair Goal Concentrate at a time and stir or shake well before first use..-Apply Shampoo to wet hair..-Lather..-Rinse thoroughly..-After shampooing, apply Conditioner Mask to wet hair, mid-lengths to ends..-Leave on for two to five minutes to use as a conditioner..-Leave on up to 10 minutes for a more intense conditioning treatment..-Rinse thoroughly..-Style hair as usual.

reviews.review_text: It's honestly very drying on my hair. Which is surprising, because wavy hair needs more moisture, but I noticed the difference the first time I used both these products. Two stars because before I began using this brand my hair was falling out and I've definitely noticed less breakage, but I wouldn't recommend this product. I'll be finishing the bottle because it was expensive, but then I definitely won't repurchase.

reviews.review_title: A new favourite in my hair care routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re trying these products for the first time, this set is the way to go - such a good value! I love that it comes with the hair goal boosters. Though these products are heavily-scented, they work extremely well and left my thick, coarse wavy hair very soft and manageable. I feel like I just came out of the salon after using it. A definite new favourite in my hair care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample in my last Sephora order of the Conditioning Hair Mask and what it did to my hair was so amazing that I was already ordering the full size online before my hair was even dry.
